assignments.title: Assignment 1: Maya Fey
assignments.description: A simple webpage about the Ace Attorney character, Maya Fey.

assignments.title: Assignment 2: Pencil
assignments.description: A webpage describing the revolutionary new technology that will turn your world upside down... a pencil.

assignments.title: Assignment 4: Tweeter

assignments.title: Assignment 5: Broadway Mood
assignments.description: An app that gives users Broadway tunes to listen to depending on their mood.
